page.title: 09Shopping
page.content:
The shops in the area are all in the village of Woodcote. These are: International Stores (groceries) Post Office (also newspapers,sweets) Wavy Line (groceries and newspapers) Handy Shop (hardware,D.I.Y. etc.) Dry Cleaners Kitchen Design Shop Garage Garden Centre Fruit Farm Shop
Many people feel that Woodcote lacks shops. They would like to see a chemist, a butcher and a greengrocer in the village. Most people travel to Reading,Wallingford or Savacentre at Theale. Some people shop in Goring and Pangbourne.
